attributes.action: Award the writer and comedian Mr. Barry Cryer a KBE (knighthood)
attributes.background: Outstanding  writer and  comedian responsible for some of the most iconic television and radio of our times.  And not getting any younger!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour.  
 
Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here: 
 
https://www.gov.uk/honours
